name: tm59
effect: Teaches Dragon Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dragon Pulse)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
